operations.notes: Connects to your Point.io account and gives you your SESSIONKEY value to perform other API calls. Also displays informations about your account.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Your Point.io account email address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Your Point.io account password.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: App ID of your Point.io application. See point.io/account for info.

operations.notes: Creates (deploys) a new hub. When you deploy a new hub, there will be no shared files or invited users by default. You will then need to share files and add your users.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: roomName
parameters.description: Friendly name for your hub

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the hub is enabled for use

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the hub. Default is an empty String.

parameters.name: roomIcon
parameters.description: URL to a 29x29 pixel jpg or png image to use as the hub icon. Default is no image.

parameters.name: mappedUrl
parameters.description: Custom URL (which hosts custom embed code) where this Hub can be accessed. Default is no URL.

parameters.name: maxusers
parameters.description: The enforced limit of members for this hub. Default is unlimited

parameters.name: hideusers
parameters.description: If set to 1, users will not be able to see the list of the other users of this hub. Default is 0

parameters.name: expirationdate
parameters.description: Expiration date for the hub. Default is no expiration date

parameters.name: visibleTabs
parameters.description: The list of visible tabs to a hub user. Insert in this field the list of name of pages you want to have visible, separated by coma. Four pages exist: HOME,SHARING,FILES,ACTIVITY. Default is HOME,SHARING,FILES,ACTIVITY.

operations.summary: Get a list of the hubs connected to your account
operations.notes: Gets you the list of your account's hubs.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

operations.summary: Give the activity feed of a specific hub.
operations.notes: Displays the activity feed of this hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

operations.summary: Authenticate to one hub you deployed or you have been invited to.
operations.notes: Connects to one of the hubs you have deployed or been invited to.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Hub ID of the hub you want to connect to. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Your Point.io account email address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Your Point.io account password.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

operations.summary: Get details about a specific hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

operations.summary: Delete a file in a hu.
operations.notes: Deletes a file in the specidied hub, room and path.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the share. Use a ROOMSHAREID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/shares/list.json method

parameters.name: containerid
parameters.description: Id of the folder you want to browse. If not filled, the default selected folder will be the root directory of the hub.

parameters.name: remotepath
parameters.description: Requested folder path for file listing. Use / for root directory (default).

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to delete. Use FILENAME value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: fileid
parameters.description: Id of the file to delete. Use FILEID value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

operations.summary: Download a file from a hub.
operations.notes: Downloads a file from the specidied hub, room and path.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the share. Use a ROOMSHAREID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/shares/list.json method

parameters.name: containerid
parameters.description: Id of the folder you want to browse. If not filled, the default selected folder will be the root directory of the hub.

parameters.name: remotepath
parameters.description: Requested folder path for file listing. Use / for root directory (default).

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to download. Use FILENAME value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: fileid
parameters.description: Id of the file to download. Use FILEID value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: convertToPdf
parameters.description: Does the file has to be converted to pdf format? False by default.

operations.summary: Get the preview of a file from a hub.
operations.notes: Gets the preview of a file from a specified hub, room and path.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the share. Use a ROOMSHAREID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/shares/list.json method

parameters.name: containerid
parameters.description: Id of the folder you want to browse. If not filled, the default selected folder will be the root directory of the hub.

parameters.name: remotepath
parameters.description: Requested folder path for file listing. Use / for root directory (default).

parameters.name: fileid
parameters.description: Id of the file to preview. Use FILEID value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to preview. Use FILENAME value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: maxWidth
parameters.description: The desired width, in pixels, of the embedded window for the preview session. Default 1024px.

parameters.name: maxHeight
parameters.description: The desired height, in pixels, of the embedded window for the preview session. Default 768px.

parameters.name: pagenum
parameters.description: The number of the page shown at the beginning of the preview session. Default: '1'

operations.summary: Upload a file to a hub.
operations.notes: Uploads the a file to a specified hub, room and path.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the share. Use a ROOMSHAREID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/shares/list.json method

parameters.name: containerid
parameters.description: Id of the folder you want to browse. If not filled, the default selected folder will be the root directory of the hub.

parameters.name: remotepath
parameters.description: Requested folder path for file listing. Use / for root directory (default).

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to update. Use FILENAME value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: fileid
parameters.description: Id of the file to update. Use FILEID value provided from a /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json call.

parameters.name: filecontents
parameters.description: An RFC1867 file upload. Your upload should be ENCTYPE=multipart/form-data encoded. Refer to RFC1867 for reference.

parameters.name: failIfExists
parameters.description: Boolean (false or false). Default is false. If enabled (false), uploads will fail if the file already exists. If disabled, the original file will be overwritten. If revision control is enabled, the original file will be stored as a revision level.

parameters.name: postAuthKey
parameters.description: default: empty String

operations.summary: Get the list of folders and files of a specific path from a specific hub.
operations.notes: Displays the list of folders and files in the chosen hub at the specified path and gives you details about those folders and files. You can use folders details to browse them as well.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method.

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the access rule you want to browse. Use a SHAREID from /hubs/{hubId}/folders/list.json to identify the access rule.

parameters.name: containerid
parameters.description: Id of the folder you want to browse. If not filled, the default selected folder will be the root directory of the hub.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Requested folder path for file listing. Use / for root directory (default).

operations.summary: Add a share to a specific hub from an access rule.
operations.notes: Adds the shares to this specific hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: shareId
parameters.description: Id of the access rule you want to share. Use a SHAREID from /accessrules/list in core.json

parameters.name: shareName
parameters.description: Friendly name for the new share.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the share is enabled for use. Default is 1.

parameters.name: defaultRole
parameters.description: Select a default role (authorizations and constraints) for your new share.

parameters.name: chroot
parameters.description: The path of the access rule the share's root will point to.

parameters.name: showFilter
parameters.description: Filters to show.

parameters.name: hideFilter
parameters.description: Filters to hide.

operations.summary: Get the list of shares for a specific hub.
operations.notes: Lists the shares of this specific hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

operations.summary: Remove a share from a specific hub.
operations.notes: Removes a share from a specific hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: roomShareId
parameters.description: Id of the share. Use a ROOMSHAREID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/shares/list.json method

operations.summary: Add a user to a specific hub.
operations.notes: Gives access to this hub to a user.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of the user you want to add.

operations.summary: Get the list of a specific hub's users.
operations.notes: Gives the list of users who have access to the hub.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: hideusers
parameters.description: If set to true, users will not be able to see the list of the other users of this hub. Default is true

operations.summary: Remove a user's access from a hub.
operations.notes: Removes one of the hub users' access to it.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: SESSIONKEY value provided by the /auth.json method.

parameters.name: hubId
parameters.description: Id of the hub. Use a ROOMID provided by the /hubs/list.json method

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of the user to remove. Use a USERID provided by the /hubs/{hubId}/users/list.json method

MESSAGE.description: If an error occured, this will be provided with a description of the error
If an error occured, this will be provided with a description of the error
If an error occured, this will be provided with a description of the error

COLUMNS.description: An Array of strings containing labels for RESULT.DATA array indices

DATA.description: A List of Lists containing data fields. The data field labels are described in RESULT.COLUMNS.
